title:
Why are so many scooters allowed to clog Wilmington\'s road if the majority of the scooters are supposed to be tagged with NC motorcycle plates in the first place?

NC law requires scooters to be registered if the exceed 49cc (motor size) however most manufacturers have been able to produce scooters with higher power using less displacement? Will NC ever look at redefining the law to give these dangerous vehicles a maximum speed limit before having to be registered with a NC license plate?
